slice.label: Lexeme
slice.tooltip: The Citation Form is used to override the Lexeme Form as the headword in the printed dictionary.

slice.label: Publish In
slice.tooltip: Remove a publication from this field to completely exclude this entry from that publication.

slice.label: Show As Headword In
slice.tooltip: The current entry is included as a main entry headword only in publications shown in this field; otherwise, it only appears in references.

slice.label: Referenced Complex Forms
slice.tooltip: Complex forms shown in this field are shown as references in this component entry in Dictionary.

slice.label: Subentries
slice.tooltip: Show these subentries below this entry in root-based dictionary views.

slice.label: Show Subentry under
slice.tooltip: The current entry is shown as a subentry under the component entries shown in this field in Dictionary.

slice.label: Show Minor Entry
slice.tooltip: Show this entry as a minor entry in Dictionary.
